Question: TokenMe B.V. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TokenMe B.V.

Product: TokenMe Construction Monitoring System

- Utilizes wireless tag and sensor technologies to monitor construction sites using UWB, LoRa, WiFi, and BLE
- Construction workers wear smart badges or helmet tags that transmit anonymous data to battery-powered mobile anchors
- Provides real-time insights and predictions on construction workflow and building conditions through AI processing
- Visualizes data on a dashboard, offering an overview of task execution, location of materials and equipment, and real-time presence of personnel
- Features fall-detect and a "request for help" button to generate warnings and critical alarms
- Monthly subscription model for quick adoption with low capital investment
Summary_cn:
TokenMe B.V.

产品：TokenMe建筑监控系统

- 利用无线标签和传感器技术，使用UWB、LoRa、WiFi和BLE监测建筑工地
- 建筑工人佩戴智能徽章或头盔标签，将匿名数据传输到电池供电的移动锚点
- 通过AI处理，提供关于建筑工作流程和建筑条件的实时洞察和预测
- 在仪表板上可视化数据，提供任务执行概览、材料和设备位置以及人员实时在场情况
- 具备摔倒检测功能和“请求帮助”按钮，生成警告和紧急警报
- 采用月度订阅模式快速采用，投资低
